title: Biden uses executive power to create a New Deal-style American Climate Corps - The Associated Press
summary: President Biden is creating a New Deal-style American Climate Corps that will serve as a major green jobs training program, employing over 20,000 young adults to work on conservation and climate resilience projects.  The climate corps had been proposed in early versions of the sweeping climate law approved last year but was jettisoned amid strong opposition from Republicans and concerns about cost.  With the new corps, the White House is working with at least six federal agencies and 10 states to create the climate corps and will pair with at least 10 states.

title: CECO Environmental Raises Full Year 2023 Outlook, Announces Acquisition of Kemco Systems, a Leader in Industrial ... - PR Newswire
summary: CECO Environmental Corp. (Nasdaq: CECO) has acquired Kemco Systems, Co. LLC (Kemco), a Florida-based company specializing in custom-engineered industrial water recycling and energy conservation solutions. This acquisition enhances CECO's North American presence and industrial water capabilities, and is expected to contribute to the company's growth and profitability. CECO has raised its full year 2023 outlook to reflect revenues of at least $525 million and adjusted EBITDA of at least $55 million.

title: Global Non-Ferrous Metals Market to Reach $1.5 Trillion by 2028, Driven by Increasing Automotive and Construction ... - GlobeNewswire

title: Navitas Debuts Next-gen GaNSafe Power Components - Eetasia.com
summary: Navitas Semiconductor's new GaNSafe series breaks the market's preconception of GaN components being limited to lower voltage applications. GaNSafe's high efficiency, power density, and performance make it suitable for demanding applications like data centers, solar/energy storage systems, and electric vehicles. GaNSafe's integration with additional protection functions and rugged high-power TOLL package for better heat dissipation sets it apart in the market.

title: Aichi Sangyo: a leading industrial solution provider for metal processing industries - The Worldfolio
